title: Cool Tech
text: Cool tech is cool. And I like that. I love tech that makes me feel cool.

title: AwEsOmE TeChBlOg
text: I like edgy tech that edges on the edge of technology. It's RAD. DARKRIDER OUT.

title: Knitting technology
text: Knitting needles these days are so tech-forward. Sometime I had to ask my grandson to reboot my needles for me.
